headline: A Fresh Look at KKR (NYSE:KKR) Valuation: Is There Still Growth Potential?
summary: KKR (NYSE:KKR) investors are keeping an eye on recent price moves, with shares ending the last session at $121.32. The stock’s trajectory over the past month has shown some positive momentum, although it has lagged over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for KKR. After a challenging start to the year, KKR’s 1-month share price return of 2.97% suggests some momentum is building again.
